entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
